addr: 5th Ave & W 42nd St New York, NY 10110
title: Night of Dreams Gala 2015 | Broadway Dreams Foundation | Bryant Park
desc: Kick off the holiday season with a festive Gala celebrating The Broadway Dreams Foundation, at Celsius, a stunning seasonal venue set in Bryant Park! Enjoy cocktails, hors d'oeuvres, and an ex clusive performance by Broadway guests as well as BDF students, as we celebrate a Night of Dreams. This year, Broadway Dreams is pleased to present our auction item for the evening: A 7-Day stay for two at one of four Hard Rock Hotel all-inclusive, luxurious resorts. ?A $2,500 value.
